name: @groww-tech/base-css
description: Base CSS classes used by all Groww Web Projects

scripts.pushTags: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag -a v$PACKAGE_VERSION -m "@groww-tech/base-css-v$PACKAGE_VERSION" && git push --tags

author: Vikas Singh <vikas.singh707@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/VikasSi25579022)
